body.description: The perfect gift or stocking stuffer for the holiday season! Elevate your daily skin care cleansing routine with our dermatologist-designed Olay Regenerist Face Cleansing Device. This 2-speed facial brush boosts the power of your cleanser for a deeper clean â€” delivering superior cleansing on hard-to-remove makeup. Just dampen your face, apply your favorite Regenerist cleanser, moisten the brush head, and gently exfoliate your face for 60 seconds to remove those dulling surface cells. Rinse for soft, refreshed skin, and your face will be primed to maximize the hydrating effectiveness of your moisturizer and better absorb anti-aging ingredients, like Niacinamide Vitamin B3. So treat yourself to self-care with our water-resistant facial brush. Replace brush head every 3 months or sooner if there is visible wear.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Exfoliating Facial Brush Our dermatologist-designed face cleansing brush is made to deliver superior cleansing on hard-to-remove makeup or just to help you wake up. To use, dampen your face, apply your favorite Olay cleanser, moisten the brush head and gently exfoliate your face for 60 seconds to remove those dulling surface cells. Rinse for soft, refreshed skin. Pairing with Your Cleanser Our facial brush preps skin for your full self-care routine — cleanse, prepare, treat and moisturize. Paired with any Olay cleanser, our brush maximizes the immediate hydrating benefits of your Olay moisturizer and primes your skin to better absorb age-defying ingredients. How to Use Our dermatologist-designed, soft & gentle brush bristles are safe for daily use — leaving your skin feeling instantly clean and fresh after just one use and helping your skin look healthier and younger over time. Ourface wash brushcomes with two brush heads and two AA batteries and offers two speed settings: daily deep cleansing or gentle exfoliation. Just remember to change the brush head every three months for best results. Custom Cleansing Routines If you’re looking to kick-start every morning with a cleanse, try our daily deep cleansing setting with a light cleanser like Regenerist Whip Cleanser. If you’re looking for a deeper, pore-refining clean, try our higher-speed gentle exfoliation setting with an exfoliating cleanser like Regenerist Detoxifying Pore Scrub.

Deeply Clean Pore Mineral Cleanser Regenerist Detoxifying Pore Scrub Luminous Brightening Cream Cleanser Regenerist Whip Cleanser Type Of Clean Mineral Cleanser Scrub Cleanser Cream Cleanser Whipped Cleanser Benefit Draws out impurities for a down-to-the-pores clean & without over-drying for a healthy look Cleanses & exfoliates to instantly diminish the look of pores & purify skin's surface Cleans, hydrates and brightens dull and uneven skin Cleans and rejuvenates with a light as air feel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and effective.
reviews.reviewText: Use nightly with CeraVe Hydrating cream to foam cleanser. Notice a major improvement in reduction of pore size and skin is much fresher looking. Feels very clean but not dry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Alternative use, dry skin itch relief
reviews.reviewText: I did originally get this for face scrubbing, but I found a much better use for it for myself, relieving itch. I obsessively wash my hands and as a result my skin gets extremely dry, to the point of tearing occasionally. Anyone else that suffers from extremely dry skin knows that sometimes scratching or hot water can feel like the only relief, but ultimately make it worse. The bristles on this brush are very soft, and gently holding it against dry skin is enough to give you the satisfaction of scratching without further irritation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This works great and will last if you know how to take care of it and have managed expectations. Here are my thoughts as a first time user...Effectiveness - I have very sensitive skin with congested pores that's prone to nodular cystic acne, blackheads and white heads. So far, this has reduced potential breakouts and evened out the texture of my skin! After one use I noticed smoother skin and nearly zero blackheads! Some reviews say they didn't notice a difference and I think that depends on thick your cleanser is, which can act like a lubricant that keeps the bristles from making full contact with your skin? I've used it with and without soap - it's definitely better WITHOUT soap if you want a deep exfoliation and glow!!Bristles - they're rigid enough to feel like they're doing something yet soft enough for sensitive skin. Some wished the bristles were firmer, but I think it would be too aggressive for everyday use and could cause more damage than good. I've been to several dermatologists and many cautioned me about over exfoliating manually (brushes, facecloth), saying it can cause micro tears in your skin for bacteria to go into or strip the skin of natural oils. Both of which cause more breakouts. I found the bristles to work well slightly damp, without soap, at buffing off dead skin gently and removing blackheads from my jawline and nose.Cleaning - reviewers that are disappointed that it doesn't remove a full face of makeup don't realize they have to take their makeup off FIRST with wipes or makeup remover. If you don't then you'll just be smearing makeup all over your face no matter how much soap you use. It did a good job getting the last trace of stubborn foundation off for me. I pulled off the brush head and cleaned it with soap after every use to make sure no makeup or skin was left behind and air dried thoroughly to keep it from getting mildew. I mean, what's the point in cleaning your face with dirty tools?Rotation - No, it doesn't spin fast but it does have TORQUE, meaning it doesn't come to a full stop when brush is pushed against the face. If it spun faster then it would skip off your face or fling soap everywhere! I soaped up my face first before using the brush to get even coverage versus putting soap on the brush. There's a learning curve to the movement pattern you use to get the best results. Sometimes moving it slowly side to side feels like it's working deeper.Battery/Defective device - I've only had my device for a week so I can't speak to its longevity but I make sure it NEVER TOUCHES WATER! The battery housing doesn't seem secure enough to seal out moisture? It says it's water resistant but I wouldn't use this in the shower. It comes with generic brand batteries but I used Energizer or Duracell Max to ensure power and life. At $19 for what I paid, it is pricey if it only lasts a few months but I'm hoping to get at least a year of daily use out of it if I keep it dry and don't drop it!Overall - it's definitely a game changer for me and I wished I had gotten this sooner! Sure, it could be more powerful, have more attachment options and be waterproof but at this price, it is what it is and gets the job done without using acid peels!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST cleansing brush!
reviews.reviewText: I had an earlier version of this brush decades ago and when it finally died, I just forgot about it, I guess. I don't know what took me so long to replace it, but when I recently ran across it online it was ADD TO CART immediately. How did I go so long w/o it? I use it about 3 times a week, keep it in the shower, and do a double-cleanse with my regular face wash. It lathers up well with my foaming cleanser and is easy to clean afterward - simply pop off the brush head and rinse well, then reattach. It comes with an extra brush head, but it takes a really long time to wear one out. I can feel how "extra" clean my skin is after using this, more so than when I just do a regular face wash. I've had no issues with it at all - runs well, just pop in the batteries and you're good to go. Great product for a reasonable price. Olay is a great company and I enjoy using many of their cleansers/creams.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Do yourself a favor and buy it!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had an Olay brush for years before it decided to fall and die on me. Bought a cheap drug store replacement and said never again as the quality was just poor and stopped working after a couple months. Purchased this Olay brush during Black Friday when then price dropped to less that $20. This brush, just as the previous one I owned, is amazing. Brush bristles are sturdy and you can feel the deep clean without your skin feeling dry or striped afterward. Also, Olay brushes have never negatively impacted my super sensitive, sometimes acne prone skin. It does come with replacement brush heads as well and with proper care and usage should last you years to come!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap starter facial brush
reviews.reviewText: It works fine for an inexpensive starter facial brush. The battery operated device is a bit weak though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am so glad I finally bought one of these! It's great for a daily exfoliation scrubber and the two speeds allow for a slower, more gentle spin. Easy to use in the shower, and the rechargeable batteries I'm using have lasted for weeks with daily use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've dropped it on several occasions. Still works fine!

My 12 year old granddaughter has just started to show interest in a skincare routine, so I bought her the Olay Facial Cleansing Brush for Christmas. It comes with extra cleansing brushes. The cleansing brushes are extremely soft. It is a very gentle exfoliating process. She uses it with a skincare kit I bought her and has been diligent for almost a week. I think the cleansing brush is the fun part of the skincare routine which makes her want to do it! A good skincare routine is so important, even at this age. ;)

los cepillos son lo suficientemente firmes y suaves para no irritar o dañar la piel y a la vez sentir los resultados de una buena limpieza y un agradable masaje facialel único inconveniente que le veo es el número de cepillos debería de venir con 4

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 17, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Fantastic but replacement heads can be expensive.
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely love it. Face feels amazing.I use my own products on it (not olay) and it’s so good. Face has never felt or looked better.Not sure how long the heads will last but replacements aren’t cheap.

reviews.reviewerName: Value for money, good product to keep my face clean
reviews.reviewText: I used some other brands before and I like this the most. It's affordable, small size (very portable) and have speed adjustment to your need.
